title: More research funding promotes economic growth

content.question: Which of the following will most likely promote long-run economic growth?

choices.label: Increasing taxes on interest earned from savings
Increasing consumption spending on food and entertainment
Increasing funding for research and development
Decreasing funding for law enforcement and judicial systems
Rapidly harvesting timber and mineral resources

content.answer: Increasing funding for research and development

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
